level.text: 3123.1 The Director has the right, after presenting credentials, to enter auneral services establishment.

3123.2 A licensee or applicant shall give the Director access to records,olicies and procedures, contracts, and any other information that the Directoreems necessary to determine the funeral services establishment’s complianceith the act or this chapter.
Source: Final Rulemaking published at 39 DCR 7853, 7865 (October 23, 1992).
